member.name: T:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown if the main assembly does not contain the resources for the neutral culture, and an appropriate satellite assembly is missing.

member.name: M:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default properties.

member.name: M:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the parameter is not null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.name: T:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute
member.summary: Informs the resource manager of an app's default culture. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the culture that the current assembly's neutral resources were written in.

member.name: P:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute.CultureName
member.returns: The name of the default culture for the main assembly.

member.name: T:System.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Represents a resource manager that provides convenient access to culture-specific resources at run time.Security Note: Calling methods in this class with untrusted data is a security risk. Call the methods in the class only with trusted data. For more information, see Untrusted Data Security Risks.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceManager.#ctor(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that looks up resources contained in files with the specified root name in the given assembly.
member.param: The root name of the resource file without its extension but including any fully qualified namespace name. For example, the root name for the resource file named MyApplication.MyResource.en-US.resources is MyApplication.MyResource.
The main assembly for the resources.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceManager.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that looks up resources in satellite assemblies based on information from the specified type object.
member.param: A type from which the resource manager derives all information for finding .resources files.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified string resource.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current UI culture, or null if cannot be found in a resource set.
member.param: The name of the resource to retrieve.
member.exception: The value of the specified resource is not a string.

No usable set of resources has been found, and there are no resources for the default culture. For information about how to handle this exception, see the "Handling MissingManifestResourceException and MissingSatelliteAssemblyException Exceptions" section in the class topic.

The default culture's resources reside in a satellite assembly that could not be found. For information about how to handle this exception, see the "Handling MissingManifestResourceException and MissingSatelliteAssemblyException Exceptions" section in the class topic.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString(System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Returns the value of the string resource localized for the specified culture.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the specified culture, or null if cannot be found in a resource set.
member.param: The name of the resource to retrieve.
An object that represents the culture for which the resource is localized.
member.exception: The value of the specified resource is not a string.

No usable set of resources has been found, and there are no resources for a default culture. For information about how to handle this exception, see the "Handling MissingManifestResourceException and MissingSatelliteAssemblyException Exceptions" section in the class topic.

The default culture's resources reside in a satellite assembly that could not be found. For information about how to handle this exception, see the "Handling MissingManifestResourceException and MissingSatelliteAssemblyException Exceptions" section in the class topic.

member.name: T:System.Resources.SatelliteContractVersionAttribute
member.summary: Instructs a object to ask for a particular version of a satellite assembly.

member.name: M:System.Resources.SatelliteContractVersionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A string that specifies the version of the satellite assemblies to load.

member.name: P:System.Resources.SatelliteContractVersionAttribute.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the satellite assemblies with the required resources.
member.returns: A string that contains the version of the satellite assemblies with the required resources.
